page.title: 09NURSERY _ DURDAR,CARLISLE(2)
page.content: When we interviewed Mr.Leslie he was very forthright on his views about living in this area.He said that he had been to every county in Britain but he liked Cumbria the best.He said that it was very quiet compared to some areas and the pace of life was leisurely.He could not think of a much healthier place to be and people tended to live to a ripe old age here. {************************************** When we asked him about changes in his business in his lifetime he said that it had improved in many ways because people were more interested in gardening because more and more of them were becoming home owners and taking a pride in their gardens.More also owned cars and were able to visit his nursery.The only change that he disliked was the introduction of VAT which he thought was a sheer nuisance.
